title: Fix footer attribution text and remove heart icon

requirements.text: Update the landing page footer copy so the attribution text reads "by echu ❤️" (replacing the existing "by Ishu"), and remove the heart icon that currently appears between the words "with" and "using" in the phrase "Built with [heart] using caffeine.ai". Keep all other footer text in English and preserve the existing caffeine.ai link URL and tracking parameters.

quotes: The change is not made. As said, Change "by Ishu" to"by echu ❤️" and remove the heart between with and using

acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the footer no longer renders a heart icon between the words "with" and "using".
On the Landing page, the footer attribution text is exactly "by echu ❤️" (including the heart after echu).
The caffeine.ai link in the footer remains present and continues to use the existing href format with the same UTM parameters.
All user-facing footer text remains in English.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing components instead).
Do not change backend code; this is a frontend-only copy/icon update.
nonGoals: No changes to session creation/joining, chat functionality, or backend persistence.
No redesign of the footer beyond the specified copy and icon removal.
No changes to the caffeine.ai link destination or tracking parameters.
